4SPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Hello.
Why don't you help me catch ^FF0000Sticky Rats^000000?
4SPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Hello.
Why don't you help me catch ^FF0000Sticky Rats^000000?

5iPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Thank you so much. Here are special balls
You can catch those sticky rats with this^006400Leaf Cat Balls^000000.
Here you are.
Please clean up ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000 with balls.
Good luck.
5iPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Thank you so much. Here are special balls
You can catch those sticky rats with this^3355FFLeaf Cat Balls^000000.
Here you are.
Please clean up ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000 with balls.
Good luck.

5yPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Darn it, and I though I
already found someone
strong enough to clean
my ship for me.
Come back if you change
your mind.
5yPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Darn it, and I though I
already found someone
strong enough to clean
my ship for me.
Come back if you change
your mind.

6CPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
You see I have an
unusual problem on my
ship. The rat on it is...
unusually dangerous..
6CPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
You see I have an
unusual problem on my
ship. The rat on it is...
unusually dangerous..

6SPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
We don't even know 
where it came from anymore.
6SPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
We don't even know 
where it came from anymore.

6iPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
The sailors tried, but one of
them almost lost a leg trying
to catch the rats.
I need someone with a lot
more ability to get the job done.
6iPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
The sailors tried, but one of
them almost lost a leg trying
to catch the rats.
I need someone with a lot
more ability to get the job done.

6yPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Here is a special ball
to kill that ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000...
It's called ^006400Leaf Cat Ball^000000
It has special poison inside
and it can kill the rats right away.
But remember, sometimes rats are smart enough to beat us down.
6yPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Here is a special ball
to kill that ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000...
It's called ^3355FFLeaf Cat Ball^000000
It has special poison inside
and it can kill the rats right away.
But remember, sometimes rats are smart enough to beat us down.

7CPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
I hope you can scour
all rats from my ship.
I will provide you ^006400Leaf Cat Balls^000000 as much as you need.
7CPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
I hope you can scour
all rats from my ship.
I will provide you ^3355FFLeaf Cat Balls^000000 as much as you need.

7SPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
If you already have
a ^006400Leaf Cat Ball^000000,
then you'll find ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000
on the deck and inside the ship itself.
If you are lucky, you can catch the rat at once. But if you are not, then...well..Let's see. Good luck!
7SPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
If you already have
a ^3355FFLeaf Cat Ball^000000,
then you'll find ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000
on the deck and inside the ship itself.
If you are lucky, you can catch the rat at once. But if you are not, then...well..Let's see. Good luck!

7iPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Wow, you have done already? Here is the list that you can exchange with your Shiny Beads.
7iPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Wow, you have done already? Here is the list that you can exchange with your Shiny Beads.

8SPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
You can exchange 2 ^006400Blue Potion^000000 with 1 ^006400Shiny Bead^000000
Would you like to exchange?
8SPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
You can exchange 2 ^3355FFBlue Potion^000000 with 1 ^3355FFShiny Bead^000000
Would you like to exchange?

9CPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Exchange of item is done. Thanks.
9CPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Exchange of item is done. Thanks.

9SPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Ok, well, if you don't want, that is fine. Have a good day!
9SPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
Ok, well, if you don't want, that is fine. Have a good day!

9iPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
I'm sorry, but would you
put some of your things
in your Kafra Storage first?
You are carrying too
many items with you.
9iPVAw.pt:
[First Mate]
I'm sorry, but would you
put some of your things

many items with you.

1 ^006400Shiny Bead^000000.
If you complete helping me
for catching ^FF0000Sticky rat^000000,
you can get 1 ^006400Shiny Bead^000000.
Good deal, huh? Why don't you try?

+iPVAw.en:
[First Mate]
Wow, you have done!!
Thanks so much! Keep
whatever useful stuff you
picked up from the sticky rat.
I'm sure I'll be needing your
help again, so drop by after
20 hours or so.
Then I will give you ^006400Leaf Cat Ball^000000 again.

AyTVAw.en:
[First Mate]
I really appreciate that you helped me last time.
^006400Leaf Cat Ball^000000 is provided every 20 hours.
Since you have completed to help me out yesterday, you need to come back 20 hours later.
